description.en:
Phoenix Unity is the utility token for PHX Innovations. Its mechanism allows for consistent growth and long-term sustainability with a real-world use case around a digital token and hard assets economics with investment strategy portfolios while earning sustainable and growing rewards without volume.

Phoenix Unity stakes for the community and pays 70% rewards out to holders weekly and 30% gets reinvested back into the staking pools which creates an increase without volume.
Phoenix Unity redistribution program continues to pay its holders every 3 hours based on volume from tax generated.
